select.getPhone: SELECT phone_number FROM forwards WHERE code_mp = '%s' AND switch_number = '%s'
select.getListenCallTest: SELECT uid, switch_number FROM calls WHERE call_datetime > '%s' AND uid = '%s' AND switch_number = '%s'
select.getWrongMessageTest: SELECT error FROM calls WHERE call_datetime > '%s' AND  error LIKE '%s'
select.getUid: SELECT uid FROM devices WHERE code_mp = '%s'
select.getCalls: SELECT id, uid, switch_number, call_datetime FROM calls WHERE uid = '%s' AND call_datetime > '%s'

update.errorUpdate: UPDATE calls SET error = '%s' WHERE id = %d
